get.description: Return a point of sale for the specified merchant.

amountCents.description: ENG: Amount of transaction - IT: Importo della transazione

idTrxAcquirer.description: ENG: Transaction acquirer ID- IT: Identificativo della transazione rispetto all'acquirer

amountCents.description: ENG: Amount cents - IT: Importo in centessimi

businessName.description: ENG: Business name - IT: Nome dell'esercente

id.description: ENG: Id of the payment - IT: Identificativo del pagamento

initiativeId.description: ENG: Id of the initiative - IT: Identificativo dell'iniziativa

initiativeName.description: ENG: Name of the initiative - IT: Nome della iniziativa

residualAmountCents.description: ENG: Remaining amount to be paid if the authorized sum is less than the requested sum - IT: Importo restante da pagare nel caso in cui la somma autorizzata sia inferiore alla somma richiesta.

residualBudgetCents.description: ENG: Residual budget - IT: Budget residuo

splitPayment.description: ENG: TRUE, if the authorized sum is less than the requested sum or FALSE, if the authorized sum is equal to the requested sum - IT: TRUE, se la somma autorizzata  inferiore alla somma richiesta o FALSE, se la somma autorizzata  uguale alla somma richiesta.

status.description: ENG: Status of the payment [CREATED: Created, IDENTIFIED: User related, AUTHORIZATION_REQUESTED: Authorization Requested, AUTHORIZED: authorized] - IT: Stato del pagamento [CREATED: Creato, IDENTIFIED: Utente associato, AUTHORIZATION_REQUESTED: autorizzazione richiesta, AUTHORIZED: autorizzato]

trxCode.description: ENG: Transaction code - IT: Codice della transazione

trxDate.description: ENG: Transaction date - IT: Data della transazione

ENG: The address of the point of sale
IT: L'indirizzo completo del punto vendita

IT: Contatto del punto vendita tramite indirizzo email.

IT: Contatto del punto vendita tramite link geografico o posizione sulla mappa

IT: Contatto del punto vendita tramite numero di telefono

channelWebsite.description:

IT: Contatto del punto vendita tramite portale web

ENG: The city of the point of sale
IT: La citt del punto vendita

IT: Il cognome del referente

id.description:

IT: La provincia del punto vendita

code.description:
"ENG: Error code:
POINT_OF_SALES_NOT_FOUND: The sale was not found,
MERCHANT_NOT_ONBOARDED: The merchant is not associated to the initiative,
POINT_OF_SALES_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Too many requests,
POINT_OF_SALES_INVALID_REQUEST: Something went wrong handling the request,
POINT_OF_SALES_GENERIC_ERROR: Application error,
- IT: Codice di errore:
POINT_OF_SALES_NOT_FOUND: Lo store non stato trovato,
MERCHANT_NOT_ONBOARDED: L'esercente non associato all'iniziativa,
POINT_OF_SALES_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: Troppe richieste,
POINT_OF_SALES_INVALID_REQUEST: Qualcosa andato storto durante l'invio della richiesta,
POINT_OF_SALES_GENERIC_ERROR: Errore applicativo"

code.description:
"ENG: Error code:
PAYMENT_NOT_FOUND_OR_EXPIRED: transaction not found or expired
PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_EXPIRED: transaction expired
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_NOT_FOUND: initiative not found
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_INVALID_DATE: initiative invalid date
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_NOT_DISCOUNT: initiative is not of discount type
PAYMENT_ALREADY_AUTHORIZED: transaction already authorized
PAYMENT_ALREADY_CANCELLED: transaction already cancelled
PAYMENT_BUDGET_EXHAUSTED: budget exhausted
PAYMENT_GENERIC_REJECTED: generic rejected error (transaction rejected)
PAYMENT_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: too many request, retry
PAYMENT_GENERIC_ERROR: application error (connection microservice error)
PAYMENT_USER_SUSPENDED: the user has been suspended on the initiative
PAYMENT_USER_NOT_ONBOARDED: user not onboarded
PAYMENT_USER_UNSUBSCRIBED: user unsubscribed
PAYMENT_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: transaction already assigned
PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: operation on transaction not allowed due to status
PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED_MISMATCHED_MERCHANT: operation on transaction not allowed due to merchant mismatched
PAYMENT_USER_NOT_ASSOCIATED: user not associated to the transaction
PAYMENT_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: cancellation of transaction not allowed due to status
PAYMENT_UNRELATE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: unrelate transaction not allowed due to status
PAYMENT_AMOUNT_NOT_VALID: amount of transaction not valid
PAYMENT_MERCHANT_NOT_ONBOARDED: the merchant is not onboarded
PAYMENT_INVALID_REQUEST: request validation error
PAYMENT_STATUS_NOT_VALID: transaction status not valid
PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_VERSION_PENDING: The transaction version is actually locked
IT: Codice di errore
PAYMENT_NOT_FOUND_OR_EXPIRED: transazione non trovata oppure scaduta
PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_EXPIRED: transazione scaduta
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_NOT_FOUND: iniziativa non trovata
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_INVALID_DATE: iniziativa con data invalida
PAYMENT_INITIATIVE_NOT_DISCOUNT: iniziativa non di tipo a sconto
PAYMENT_ALREADY_AUTHORIZED: transazione gi autorizzata
PAYMENT_ALREADY_CANCELLED: transazione gi cancellata
PAYMENT_BUDGET_EXHAUSTED: budget esaurito
PAYMENT_GENERIC_REJECTED: errore generico, transazione rigettata
PAYMENT_TOO_MANY_REQUESTS: troppe richieste, riprovare
PAYMENT_GENERIC_ERROR: errore generico (errore nella connessione ad un microservizio)
PAYMENT_USER_SUSPENDED: l'utente stato sospeso dall'iniziativa
PAYMENT_USER_NOT_ONBOARDED: utente non onboardato all'iniziativa
PAYMENT_USER_UNSUBSCRIBED: utente disiscritto dall'iniziativa
PAYMENT_ALREADY_ASSIGNED: transazione gi assegnata
PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: transazione non consentita a causa dello stato della transazione
PAYMENT_NOT_ALLOWED_MISMATCHED_MERCHANT: transazione non consentita a causa della mancata corrispondenza del merchant
PAYMENT_USER_NOT_ASSOCIATED: utente non associato alla transazione
PAYMENT_DELETE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: annullamento della transazione non consentito a causa dello stato della transazione
PAYMENT_UNRELATE_NOT_ALLOWED_FOR_TRX_STATUS: disassociazione non consentita a causa dello stato della transazione
PAYMENT_AMOUNT_NOT_VALID: importo nella transazione non valido
PAYMENT_MERCHANT_NOT_ONBOARDED: il merchant non onboardato
PAYMENT_INVALID_REQUEST: errore di validazione della richiesta
PAYMENT_STATUS_NOT_VALID: stato della transazione non valido"
PAYMENT_TRANSACTION_VERSION_PENDING: La versione del contatore attualmente bloccata
PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND: Prodotto non trovato o non approvato

GET_transactions_in_progress_404_Respons.description: The requested resource was not found

GET_transactions_processed_404_Response.description: The requested resource was not found

Access-Control-Allow-Origin.description: CORS header to allow cross-origin requests

Retry-After.description: Indicates how long the user agent should wait before making a follow-up request

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: The maximum number of requests allowed in the current period

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests remaining in the current period

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The time at which the rate limit resets (in UTC epoch seconds)
